content: this came about after futzing with bunches of squares and motifs - i hope you enjoy it as much as i do many thanks to thatloganchick 2 for the idea check out jmjbean s single sided strap mod 3 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/thatloganchick 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/jmjbean/2-sided-spiral-tawashi-2
